title: Had to remake game but counted as loss in promos
body: I was in a game and disconnected but when I cam back someone else was DCed. We decided to remake and the match counted as a loss in my promos. I don't know if me leaving registered as afk to count loss or some bug. If someone knows whats wrong please respond thanks

replies.body:
I took a look at your account, and it doesn't look like the loss was actually caused by the remade match. The loss was caused by the dodge that happened just before the remade game. Any dodges during a promo series will instantly count as a loss.

Full details can be found on our [Queue Dodging FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging). Let me know if you have any questions.
Thanks for the help, just glad I won the next game for promos lol
